Package ‘bigdatadist’
September 24, 2018
Version 1.1
Date 2018-09-23
Title Distances for Machine Learning and Statistics in the Context of
Big Data


#### Description 

 Functions to compute distances between probability measures or any other data ob-
ject than can be posed in this way, entropy measures for samples of curves, dis-
tances and depth measures for functional data, and the Generalized Mahalanobis Kernel dis-
tance for high dimensional data. For further details about the metrics please refer to Mar-
tos et al (2014) <doi:10.3233/IDA-140706>; Martos et al (2018) <doi:10.3390/e20010033>; Her-
nandez et al (2018, submitted); Martos et al (2018, submitted).
